p: The human hepatocarcinoma HepG2 cells and murine bone marrow stromal S17 cells were kindly provided by the Centre for Molecular and Structural Biomedicine of Biomedical and Molecular BME, University of Algarve, Portugal), while mouse melanoma B16 4A5 cells were purchased from Sigma-Aldrich (Taufkirchen, Germany). All cell lines were cultured in Dulbecco’s Modified Eagle medium (DMEM), supplemented with foetal bovine serum (10%), L-glutamine (2 mM, 1%), and penicillin (50 U/mL)/streptomycin (50 μg/mL) (1%), and kept under a humidified atmosphere at 37 °C and 5% CO 2.
